Used as the 6502/65C02 CPU core for the RP6502 emulator (model: W65C02). Built with `-DVR_EMU_6502_STATIC`. To update, copy `src/vrEmu6502.c`, `src/vrEmu6502.h`, and `LICENSE` from the upstream repo.
